1242:51: yasmādbhagavatpravacane pramāṇaparicchinna upāyo vimuktilakṣaṇa upeyaśca nirdiśyate teṣāṃ cāgama upāyopeyayoḥ pramāṇarahitatvāttato bhagavata eva vāco jayatti nānyeṣāmiti bhagavataḥ stutiḥ |
1242:53: bhidheyasyaiva prayojanaṃ na samyagjñānavyutpatteḥ śāstraprayojanasya prayojanam |

1242:58: nanu yathābhidheyasya prayojanaṃ cintyate tathā śabdasyāpi kimiti na cintyata ityāha tatretyādi |

1242:78: nanu ca tadyutpattiḥ kriyata ityevaṃ yujyate vaktuṃ kimiti tadyutpādyata iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti |

1242:85: yasmātsamyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyamānāñśiṣyānprerayati vyutpāditaṃ samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyadhvamityātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartumārabdhaṃ prakaraṇam |

1242:93: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇayā nītyopāyo vyutpādanamupeyam |

1242:99: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ pravṛttau tadasaṃgatameveti manyamānaścodayati nanvityādinā |
1242:101: yo hi prāmāṇikaḥ sa pramāṇe pravartate |

1242:111: tena yaduktaṃ kenacidyākhyānakārā eva prayojanādīni pratipādayiṣyantīti tatpratyuktam |

1242:140: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare pravartakaprāpakajñāne na bhavatastatrārthe tāvanna pramāṇavyāpāraparisamāptirityāha adhigata ityādi |
1242:142: adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye kartavye'

1242:151: pravartitaḥ puruṣa iti pravartanayogyatvātpravartita ityucyate prāpaṇayogyatvātprāpitaḥ |
1242:152: evaṃ sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāṇe svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha tatra yo'

1242:192: deśākārābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ śakyatvādbhavatvanyākārasyānyadeśasya ca prāptāvapramāṇam |
1242:199: styeva kiṃ tu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmāṇyalakṣaṇamucyate api tu saṃtānāpekṣayā |

1242:205: sa ca hetuhetumadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavati yadi saṃtānāpekṣayā prāmāṇyamavatiṣṭhate na kṣaṇāpekṣayeti |

1242:208: kāraṇaśabda eva kasmānna kṛta ityāha kāraṇaśabda ityādi |

1242:216: yadyevamanantarameva kimiti na parīkṣyata ityāha yatraiva hītyādi |
1242:218: rthakriyāsamarthavastupravartake puruṣasya saṃdehastadeva parīkṣyate na cānattarasādhanajñāne saṃdehastadanattaraṃ sukhaduḥkhapratibhāsajñānodayāt |

1242:225: tena hyevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate puruṣasya prayojanaṃ dārupākādi |

1242:238: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścidveyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvātkathanaṃ upekṣaṇīyasya tadviparyayānna kathanamiti tatpratyuktam |

1242:255: dviprakārāpītyādinā paravyākhyāṃ darśayati api tvayamartha ityādinātmīṣāṃ vyākhyām |

1242:287: dvividhameva samyagjñānamityavadhāraṇārthaṃ tenaikatricaturā saṃkhyā nirastā syāt |
1242:294: tataśca pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣo ghaṭa iti na syāt |
1242:295: idameva syātpratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kuṇḍaṃ ceti |

1242:302: atrāpi paścānmānamanumānami tyavyapībhāvasamāse pūrvavajrodyamudrāvya gatisamāsa āśrayitavyaḥ |

1242:312: etaccāyuktaṃ yasmādekavibhaktinirdeśe kriyāmāṇe cakāreṇa tulyabalatvaṃ na pradarśitaṃ syāditi |
1242:316: anena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyānaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhanūpaṃ pratyuktam |
1242:319: yadyapyanvarthasaṃjñayā kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yadbhrāntaṃ ca tatpratyakṣamiti śakyate yathārthaṃ kathayituṃ tathāpi na svanūpaṃ pratyakṣasya kathitaṃ syāt yato'
1242:320: nyadapi pratyakṣasya svanūpamarthasākṣātkārādikamastīti lakṣyalakṣaṇe tu yathārthaṃ kathite kathitaṃ bhavati |
1242:322: ata eva na lakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ saṃjñākaraṇaṃ bhavati saṃjñākaraṇatvenāpratīterlakṣaṇakaraṇasya |
1242:323: śabdamanūdyānityatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate na cānityatvaṃ saṃjñeti gamyata iti saṃjñālakṣaṇakaraṇayorbhedaḥ |
1242:324: yastvanayoḥ pradeśāntaraprasiddhayoranuvādaṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣatvaṃ vidadhāti tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgyā yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdya lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate na tu lakṣaṇamanūdya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate |
1242:325: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇamanūdya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate yathā yaḥ śikhāvānsa parivrājaka iti |
1242:326: śikhālakṣaṇavidhānakāle tu parivrājakānuvādena śikhaiva vidhīyate na viparītavidhānamityanyadapyasminyakṣe dūṣaṇaṃ dattaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ ṭīkākṛteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam |
1242:327: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na saṃbhavati tataśca kathaṃ pratyakṣalakṣyamanūdya lakṣaṇaṃ vijñāpyate |
1242:328: yathā śikhayā prarivrājaka ityitra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyata ityāśaṅkyāha yattadbhavatāmityādi |
1242:330: yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na prasiddhaṃ tathāpyarthasākṣātkāritvena sāmānyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasiddham |
1242:332: nanu ca tayoraprasiddhatvātpratyakṣasyāprasiddhireva pratyakṣasya tatsvabhāvatvādityāśaṅkyāha na caitanmantavyamityādi subodham |
1242:342: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyā padadvayavyavacchedakathananūpā dūṣitā |
1242:345: evaṃ satyanumānasyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham |
1242:346: yadyevaṃ vyākhyāyate ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntamityevamucyamāne sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacitpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt | tathā cāha |
1242:349: na tadapyatrācāryeṇa saṃgṛhītamiti tadayuktaṃ yata ācāryeṇa vipratipattinirāsārthaṃ padadvayaṃ kṛtaṃ na vyavacchedārtham |
1242:352: pi kimiti vyavacchedārthaṃ na bhavatītyāha etaccetyādi |
1242:356: api tvarthakriyākṣame vastunūpa ālambane yanna bhrāmyati tadabhrāntaśabdena gṛhyate |
1242:360: yogācāramatena tvabhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyaṃ saṃvādakasya samyagjñānasya prastutatvāt anyavyāvartyasyābhāvāt |
1242:365: yathā nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ tathā jātyādiyojanājñānamapi samyagjñānamindriyajaṃ upadarśitasyārthasya prāpaṇāt |
1242:373: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamarśinī ||
1242:374: na so'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte |
1242:376: tathā naiyāyikādīnāṃ savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamiti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirākriyate |
1242:378: bhrāntagrahaṇamatiricyamānaṃ dvicandrajñānādeḥ samyagjñānādhikaraṇa evaṃ nirastatvādvipratipattinirāsārthatvameva bhavati |
1242:379: tathācāryaikadeśīyāḥ śukle śaṅkhe pītajñānaṃ gacchadvṛkṣadarśanajñānaṃ cālātacakrajñānamabhrāntamapi samyagjñānamicchanti vastuno'
1242:383: tathā sati abhrāntagrahaṇa ityādinābhrāntaśabdasya vipratipattiviṣayaṃ darśayati |
1242:390: bhrāntārtha iti tasyārthasya grahaṇe doṣaṃ darśayati na tvavisaṃvādakamityādinā |
1242:391: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanetyādinā kalpanābahutvātkasyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ grahaṇamiti kalpanāviśeṣamajñānanpṛcchati |
1242:392: tathā hi vaibhāṣikā indriyavijñānaṃ vitarkavicāracaitasikasaṃprayuktaṃ kalpanāmicchanti |
1242:393: yogācāramatena ca tathāgatajñānamadvayaṃ muktvā sarvajñānaṃ grāhyagrāhakatvena vikalpitaṃ kalpanā |
1242:395: abhilāpetyādinā śabdasaṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇaṃ nāgamaparipaṭhitānāmiti darśayati |
1242:399: tena vinītadevavyākhyā dūṣitā abhilapyata ityabhilāpaḥ vācyaḥ sāmānyādirityevaṃnūpā |
1242:400: evamevedamāśrayaṇīyamanyathā yogyagrahaṇena śabdasaṃsargayogyo na kathitaḥ syāditi |
1242:401: yadyevaṃ dharmottaravyākhyāne jātyādervācyasya saṃsargabhāvo na pradarśitaḥ syāt |
1242:405: nanu ca yadyapi tasmiñjñāna ākārayormīlanaṃ tathāpi śabdārthayoḥ saṃsargo nāstītyāha |
1242:411: nanu cāvyutpannasaṃketasya bālamūkāderanumato vijñāne na śabdasaṃsarga iti tadyotyatvamapi nāsti |
1242:420: tataśca vyāvartyābhāvādyogyagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkāṃ parasya darśayati asatyabhilāpetyadinā |
1242:432: nanu ca bālasya tālvādikaraṇapāṭavābhāve sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdoccāraṇaṃ nāsti tatkimucyate sa evāyamiti |
1242:433: satyaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu sa evāyamityanena vikalpasyāvasthocyate |
1242:438: bālasyāpi pūrvāparaparāmarśanūpaṃ vikalpakaṃ vijñānamasti niyataviṣaye pravṛtteḥ yathā gṛhītasaṃketasya pūrvāparaparāmarśena pravṛttiriti |
1242:440: tadaniyatapratibhāsaṃ pūrvāparayorāropitatvāditi saṃsargayogyaṃ bālamūkādervijñānamiti tannivṛttyartha yogyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti sthitam |
1242:441: indriyavijñānamityādinā kumārilena yadindriyavijñānasyālocanākhyasya bālamūkādivijñānena sādṛśyaṃ pratipāditaṃ taddūṣayitumupasaṃhāravyājena vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati |
1242:443: ata eva svalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdasyārthasya ca vācyavācakatvamabhyupagamya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya sādhyate |
1242:446: yadyapītyanena svalakṣaṇayorvācyavācakabhāvābhyupagamaṃ darśayati paramārthataḥ sāmānyayoreva vācyavācakatvaṃ nārthaśabdaviśeṣasyetyādinā nyāyena |
1242:452: tena yadvinītadevena sāmānyayorvāghyavācakabhāvamaṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya pratipāditaṃ taddūṣitaṃ bhaṅgyā |
1242:457: yadā ghaṭaśabdaḥ śabdaśabdo vā śabdaṃ śabdena pratipadyate tadā kiṃcidvācyaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃcidvācakaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇamiti |
1242:458: tataḥ śruddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabdavijñāne dvayorapi śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanācchrotrendriyajñānamaniyatapratibhāsitvātsavikalpakaṃ syādityākūtam |
1242:461: yadyapi svalakṣaṇayorvācyavācakatvaṃ tathāpi śrotravijñāne na vācyavācakatayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanaṃ api tu śuddhayoreva pratibhāsanaṃ yasmācchabdasaṃnidhibalena śrotravijñānamutpadyate |
1242:463: yāvatsaṃketakālabhāviśabdasmaraṇaṃ na bhavati tāvatkuto vācyatvaṃ vācakatvaṃ vā syāt etatpratyabhijñayā sa evāyaṃ vācako bhaviṣyatītyāha |
1242:466: kaśca saṃketaviṣayaḥ śabdo yaḥ saṃketakālabhāvinā jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ |
1242:467: yaśca pūrvajñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sa idānīṃ nāsti pūrvajñānavināśe pūrvajñānaviṣayatvasyābhāvāt |
1242:469: yogijñānena yadyekasminkāle manovijñānena ca yugapacchandārthau gṛhīte tathāpi saṃnihitavastutayā tena gṛhītavyāviti darśayati |
1242:471: nanu kalpanājñānamapi parayā kalpanayā śūnyaṃ tataśca tasyāpi nirvikalpakatvaṃ prāpnotītyāśaṅkyāha |
1242:475: tra kalpanātvaṃ lakṣyate yathā viṣāṇītyatra viṣāṇitvaṃ tataśca kalpanātvena rahitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tannirvikalpakam |
1242:477: kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvayorlakṣaṇayoḥ parasparaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ na svātantryeṇa pṛthaglakṣaṇatvamiti darśayitumante pratyakṣaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā tayorapi saṃbadhnāti tatpratyakṣamiti pareṇa saṃbandha ityanena |
1242:486: bāhyā nauḥ sevāśrayastatra sthitasyāśrayadvārako vibhrama ucyate |
1242:490: nānyairindriyamagatairindriyaṃ vikriyāṃ gatamityāha sarvairevetyādi timirasya sākṣādalātādeḥ pāramparyeṇeti etacca viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditamiti |
1242:491: saṃkṣobhapadena saha dvandvaṃ kṛtvā bahuvrīhiriti darśayati viniścaye tu saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvādiśabdena bahuvrīhisamāsa darśayataḥ ko'
1242:494: yadā saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ tadāśrayagatasya vibhramakāraṇasyopalakṣaṇatvādvātapittādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti nārthabhedaḥ |
1242:495: atha kimarthamāśubhramaṇagrahaṇāderupādānaṃ timirādītyeva kriyatāmādigrahaṇena sarveṣāṃ saṃgraho bhaviṣyati |
1242:499: teṣāmupādāne padyādigrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta tadā teṣāṃ svanūpagrahaṇameva syāt |
1242:501: tata ubhayopādāne sati timirādīnāmubhayakātsyarna labhyata iti sthitam |
1242:502: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānamiti yadyapi sūtre jñānagrahaṇaṃ nāsti tathāpi bhrānte jñānadharmatvāttadyudāsena jñānameva pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata ityadoṣaḥ |
1242:503: vinītadevavyākhyāyāṃ bhavati tu pratyakṣasūtrasyārthakathanaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti tasmātsthitaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣabhrāntamiti ||
1242:506: mānase ca pratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvita iti dvābhyāṃ bhikṣavo nūpaṃ dṛśyate cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena manovijñāneneti tadāgamasiddhaṃ manovijñānamācāryadignāgena pratyakṣaṃ darśitaṃ tatparaiḥ kumārilādibhirlakṣaṇamajñānadbhirdūṣitam |
1242:507: tanmanojñānaṃ yadīndriyavijñānaviṣaye pravartate tadā gṛhītagrāhitayāpramāṇaṃ athānyaviṣaye pravartate vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ bhavatkiṃ tanmanovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ syānnirāpekṣaṃ vā |
1242:508: indriyasavyapekṣatve satīndiyavijñānameva nirāpekṣatve vānindriyasyāpi manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādityandhabadhirādyabhāvacodya kṛtam |
1242:509: svasaṃvedanaṃ ca nābhyupagatamiti mīmāṃsakaiḥ parokṣaṃ vijñānamarthāpattigamyaṃ pratyakṣo'
1242:511: naiyāyikādibhistu jñānāntaragamyaṃ jñānamiṣyate na svasaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ svātmani kāritvavirodhāt |
1242:514: yogina eva na saṃprati pramāṇābhāvāt kiṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ jñānamiti indriyāśritamiti cakṣurādīndriyacatuṣṭayaṃ gṛhyate |
1242:515: na mana indriyaṃ tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣe pratipādyamānatvāt |
1242:516: indriyāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti bruvatā thismuc vārtikakṛtā na cakṣuḥ pramāṇamiti kathitaṃ bhavati yasmājjñānasyaivānvayavyatirekānuvidhānādrūpādidarśane sāmarthyaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ |
1242:517: yatūktaṃ jñānaṃ cetpaśyati vyavahitamapi kiṃ na paśyati amūrtasyāvācakābhāvāditi tadayuktaṃ yato yogyadeśenaivārthena tajjñānaṃ janyate na vyavahitena vijñānādarśanāt |
1242:519: tasyānāntara ityasya vivaraṇaṃ na vidyata ityādi |
1242:525: nanu ca kathaṃ viṣayakṣaṇasya sahakāritvamekasminkṣaṇe upakāryopakārakabhāvābhāvādityata āha dvividhaścetyādi |
1242:530: yadā yogijñānaṃ parasyaivaṃvidhajñānamālambate tadālambanabhūtena yogijñānaṃ janyata iti |
1242:532: samanantara iti ca bhavati śakandhvādiṣu pāṭhāt paranūpatvaṃ yataḥ sa ceti samanantaraḥ hetutvāditi pratyayārthakathanametat |
1242:534: indriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇopādānabhūtena yajjanitaṃ tadeva manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na ālambanabhūtena janitamityarthaḥ |
1242:535: yadā cetyādinā dvayorekaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhītvā yañcoditaṃ pareṇa tatparihṛtaṃ pūrvakṣaṇa indriyavijñānasya viṣayo dvitīyakṣaṇe manovijñānasya viṣaya ityagṛhītagrāhi manovijñānamiti |
1242:536: yadā cetyādinā yaccodyaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi manovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ na syānmanovijñānasyendriyavijñānaviṣayādanyo viṣayaḥ tadāndhabadirādyabhāvaḥ vyavahitasya nīlādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatviti tatparihṛtam |
1242:537: yasmādindriyavijñānaviṣayasya dvitīyopādeyabhūtaviṣayakṣaṇo gṛhīto manovijñānaviṣayaḥ tasmādyavahitakṣaṇo viṣayo na bhavatyasyāndhabadirādeścātīndriyavijñānam |
1242:539: tena teṣāṃ na manovijñānaṃ bhavatīti parihṛtam |
1242:542: anyathā pañca bāhyā vijñeyā ityasya vyāghātaḥ syāt |
1242:543: svaviṣayānantaraviṣayaśabdena śrotravijñānaviṣayānantarayogyaviṣayo gṛhyate nopādeyakṣaṇa eva tena vijñānaviṣayadeśe'
1242:544: paraśabdo yadotpadyate tadā mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā janitaṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ |
1242:547: yadā cakṣurviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ satpunardvitīye kṣaṇa ātmīyaviṣayānantaraviṣayenotpādyata indriyāṇāṃ tatra vyāpārābhāvāt |
1242:548: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā mānasapratyakṣamutpadyata iti sthitam |
1242:549: nanvekasminkṣaṇe tasyotpādake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyata iti puruṣārthānupayogitvātprāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti |
1242:552: te ca tasminkṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadya dharmadeśanādikāmarthakriyāmāsādayantītyinavadyam |
1242:553: atha vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimiti mānasotpattirlupyata ityāha vyāpāravatityādi sarvendriyāśritaṃ jñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānameva na mānasasyotpattirastītyabhiprāyaḥ|
1242:554: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati dvitīye kṣaṇe mānasaṃ bhavati yadyapi samānajātīyayoryugapadutpattirnāstītyāha itarathetyādi |
1242:556: vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadyate dvitīye kṣaṇe yogyakaraṇe sati samānanūpaṃ tena tayoḥ kathamindriyavijñānavyapadeśo na syāditi |
1242:557: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ indriyajñānādbhinnaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavettadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāstītyāha etaccetyādi |
1242:558: evaṃjātīyakamitīndriyavijñānasadṛśaṃ tadetaddharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yatpramāṇamupanyastaṃ vikalpodayāditi tadbhaṅgyāvadhāraṇādeva dūṣitam |
1242:559: tairevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ vyāpāravati cakṣuṣīndriyajñānamutpadyate mānasaṃ ca |
1242:561: yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti na bhinnendriyayoḥ ṣaṇāṃ yugapadutpattiriti vacanāt |
1242:563: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasaṃ nāstīti śakyate vaktuṃ samānajātīyanīlavikalpodayāt |
1242:564: yadi ca tanna mānasaṃ syāttatpṛṣṭhabhāvī nīlavikalpā ne syādeva |
1242:566: yathā deevadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati |
1242:572: na ca vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi mānasasyotpattirasti na ca dvayornīlavijñānayorutpattirnirvikalpayordṛśyate anupalabhyamānatvāttayoḥ |
1242:575: yena bhinnasaṃtānānnirvikalpakādutpattirna syādekasaṃtānapātitvāttayoravaśyaṃ cāṅgīkartavyā vijātīyā vikalpasyotpattiryena vārtikakāra evamāha |
1242:579: tataśca tatsāmarthyabhāvi kathaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ smaraṇaṃ vijātīyatvāt |
1242:580: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyata indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt |
1242:581: kiṃ cendriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ yadi svavyāpāraṃ karoti |
1242:584: nanu cittacaittā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ tadgrahaṇamityāha sukhādaya evetyādi |
1242:585: na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhādayaḥ cittacaittā svasaṃvedanā gṛhyatte anye'
1242:589: evaṃ bruvatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyavasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kāciccittāvasthā saṃvedyate yataḥ |
1242:590: nanu cittacaittā nāmātmasaṃvedanaṃ nāsti syātmani kāritvavirodhādityuktamityāha yena hītyādi |
1242:593: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśatayaṃ svanūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāttaramapekṣate tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svanūpaṃ nivedayannātmasaṃvedane na jñānāttaramapekṣate |
1242:594: na ca svātmani kāritvavirodho yato vāstavakārakatvābhāvaḥ |
1242:596: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva |
1242:599: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodhanūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnūyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti |
1242:602: pi bāhyanūpāḥ sukhādaya iti manyate taṃ pratyāha iha ca nūpādo dṛśyamāna ityādi |
1242:604: nīlanūpātsātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhyenābhinnanūpaṃ jaḍanūpaṃ ca śakyate vaktumiti |
1242:605: amumevārthaṃ na ca gṛhyamānākāra ityādinā darśayati |
1242:608: na ca nīlasya sātanūpatvamanugamyata iti tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā vikalpena sātanūpo nīlādirnānugamyata ityarthaḥ |
1242:609: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddha iti sāṃkhyaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyagrāhakaṃ sātādinūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam |
1242:610: tena yuktamuktaṃ keścit grāhyādbhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyata iti tena kiṃcinnāma nāpahnutaṃ bhavatītyuktam |
1242:623: tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhe tyādinopasaṃhāravyājena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati |
1242:624: bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthekā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā dvitīyā bhāvyamānasya karatalāmalakavaddarśanaṃ yoginaḥ tṛtīyāvastheti |
1242:627: iti nyāyādyadyapi manojñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajena śabdārthauo yugapadgṛhyete tathāpi dvayoḥ svanūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāttadgrāhi vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakamiti |
1242:628: nuna ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantajaṃ manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratibhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati |
1242:630: pamityanaikāntiko heturiti paccoditaṃ pareṇa tatparihartumupakramate vikalpavijñānaṃ hītyādinā |
1242:632: yadyapi manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭapratibhāsi tathāpi sphuṭābhatvāvasthāyāṃ tadalīkākāraṃ vācyavācakanūpamapaiti vittinūpaṃ tu tasya nijam |
1242:633: atastadeva cidrūpaṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati na vācyavācakākāratayā tayorāropitanūpatvāt |
1242:634: āropitanūpagrahaṇasphuṭatvameva na syāditi nānaikāntikatvaṃ hetoḥ sphuṭābhatvādityasya |
1242:635: yadā tu vikalpavijñānaṃ śabdasaṃsargayogyavastu gṛhṇāti tadā saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena tadvastu gṛhṇāti |
1242:638: tacca pūrvavijñānaṃ saṃprati śabdasaṃsargayogyavastugrahaṇakāle nāsti kṣaṇikatvājjñānasya |
1242:639: tadvatpūrvavijñānaviṣayatvamapi saṃprati nāsti viṣayiṇo jñānasyābhāve viṣayasyāpyarthasya saṃketakālabhāvinojbhāva ityasaṃnihataṃ saṃketakālabhāvi tadvastvāropya gṛhṇadvikalpavijñānamasphuṭaṃ bhavatīti |
1242:642: tataḥ sphuṭatvānnirvikalpakaṃ yogijñānamabhrāntaṃ ca pramāṇena śuddhārthagrāhitvātsaṃvādakam |
1242:645: prakārabhedamiti pratyakṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ nirvikalpakamabhrāntaṃ tasya prakārabheda indriyajñānādiḥ |
1242:648: iha kaiścinmīmāṃsakādimiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣau dvāvapi viṣayau kalpitau |
1242:650: sāṃkhyena dvayorapi viśeṣo viṣaya iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasyābhāvāt |
1242:651: vedāntavādinā ca sāmānyameva viṣayo dvayoḥ ātmadvaitatayā sarvasyaikatvādviśeṣe bhrāntatvāddvayoriti vipratipattiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣaye |
1242:660: tatrāsādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhyaviṣaya iti darśayati yadasādhāraṇamityādinā |
1242:661: nanu kimucyate grāhyaviṣaya iti yāvatā kimanyo viṣayo'
1242:664: yamadhyavasyatīti yaṃ saṃtānanūpeṇa sthitamarthaṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā vikalpena niścinoti |
1242:665: nanu ca kathaṃ pratyakṣasya saṃtāno viṣayo yato vikalpasyāsau viṣayaḥ |
1242:678: nanu pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya ityukte sāmānyamapi tasya viṣaya iti tadapi svalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti praśnaḥ |
1242:679: asaṃnidhānaṃ dūradeśāvasthānamiti bruvatā vinītadevasya vyākhyā dūṣitā |
1242:680: tena hyevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ sarveṇa nūpeṇa vastuno'
1242:683: etadasaṃgataṃ yasmādvastunaḥ tatrābhāve jñānameva na bhavati |
1242:689: nanu sāmānyameva dūre gṛhyamāṇamasphuṭapratibhāsaṃ na svalakṣaṇamityāha sarvāṇyevetyādi sāmānyasyāvidyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
1242:690: ataḥ tānyeva svalakṣaṇāni sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsīni na sāmānyam |
1242:691: nanu yadi dūrāsannābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ nūpadvayaṃ tasya syāt tataśca nikaṭasthitasya pratibhāsadvayaṃ syāt na ca niyamo dūre'
1242:693: ucyate na hi nīlaṃ vastu spaṣṭanūpamaspaṣṭaṃ ca api tu nīlaṃ sādhyārthakriyāsamarthaṃ nīlaparamāṇunūpam |
1242:695: yadā dūre nīlaṃ paśyati tadālokaparamāṇūnāṃ ca rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtatvātspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati |
1242:696: nikaṭe tu ālokaparamāṇūnāṃ bahutvānna te rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtā iti spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate |
1242:697: jñānasya spaṣṭādidvāreṇārthasya spaṣṭāspaṣṭanūpe bhavato na paramārthata iti |
1242:700: nanu tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇamityuktaṃ tatra yadi pratyakṣasyaiva viṣayo bhavati svalakṣaṇaṃ nānyasyeti tadānumānāderna svalakṣaṇaviṣayaḥ |
1242:703: tadānumānasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo na niṣiddha iti svalakṣaṇaviṣayamanumānaṃ syāditi manyamānaḥ pṛcchati |
1242:707: yadyapi vikalpasya viṣayo vastu na bhavati tathāpi sa eva svalakṣaṇaṃ dāhādyarthakriyānūpeṇa vyavasāyādityabhiprāyaḥ |
1242:710: na hāropabalādavastu vastu bhavati sarvasya śaśaviṣāṇādervastutvaprasaṅgāt |
1242:714: idameva paramārthasattvaṃ nāma yaduta jñāne pratibhāsanam |
1242:715: sāmānyamapi jñāne pratibhāsate tadapi paramārtha saditi manyamānaḥ pṛcchati |
1242:718: tadayamartha ityādinā samudāyasya padānāṃ tātparyaṃ darśayati |
1242:723: na ca jñānajanakatvenārthakriyākāritvaṃ tasya jñānasya vināpi sāmānyena vāsanābalātsāmānyaviṣayasyotpatteriti |
1242:725: tathāhītyādinā pratyakṣaviṣayeṇa saha vikalpaviṣayasya sāmānyasya visadṛśatvaṃ darśayati |
1242:726: kathaṃ punarvikalpasya viṣayo bhavati sāmānyamityāha samāropyamāṇamiti sakalavahnisādhāraṇatayā sāmānyākārasya saṃvedyatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
1242:727: so'numānasya viṣayo grāhyanūpa iti grāhyaṃ nūpamasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ |
1242:728: atrāpi grāhyāpekṣayā viṣayo vyavasthāpito na prāpyāpekṣayā tatrāvipratipatteḥ |
1242:729: nanu tatsāmānyamiti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ prastutya sa ityanena puṃtliṅgena parāmarśaḥ kathamityāha sarvanāmnetyādi |
1242:730: kasmātpunaḥ pratyakṣapariccheda anumānasya viṣayavipratipattirnirākṛtā vārtikakāreṇa nānumānapariccheda ityāha sāmānyalakṣaṇamityādi |
1242:733: numānasya viṣayo vyavasthāpyeta tadā tatraiva granthaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt |
1242:734: ko'sau vānumānasya viṣayaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayādanyaḥ pratyakṣasyaiva ko'
1242:735: sau viṣayo yadapekṣayāyamanyaḥ punarvaktavyaṃ svalakṣaṇamityevamāvartyamāne gauravaṃ syāt |
1242:739: tathāhi pramāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ pramitikriyāṃ vinā na bhavati yathā chittiṃ vinā na paraśuḥ |
1242:742: ato mīmāṃsakenendriyaṃ pramāṇamindriyārthasannikarṣaḥ manaindriyasannikarṣaḥ ātmamanaḥ sannikarṣaśceṣṭaḥ sarve sannikarṣāśceti | taduktam |
1242:744: manaso vendriyairyoga ātmanā sarva eva vā ||
1242:746: tadā jñānaṃ phalaṃ tatra vyāpārācca pramāṇatā |
1242:747: vyāpāro na yadā teṣāṃ tadā notpadyate phalamiti ||
1242:748: tathā pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pramāṇamuttaramuttaraṃ phalamiti coktam |
1242:752: idaṃ tvadhikaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ viśeṣyajñānaṃ phalamiti yathoktaṃ kumārilena |
1242:757: kathaṃ punararthaparichittinūpaṃ pramāṇasya phalaṃ nārthapravartakādi vijñānamityāha arthasyetyādi |
1242:759: yena phalena niṣpannenānantareṇa pramāṇasya karaṇatvavyapadeśo bhavati tadeva phalaṃ nānyat |
1242:760: arthaparicchedakatvena vijñāna utpanne svaviṣayaniścayajanakatve sati samāpto jñānasya pramāṇavyāpāra iti |
1242:763: pramāṇādarthaparicchittinūpasya phalasya bhinnatvaṃ darśayituṃ pramāṇajñānasya svanūpaṃ prāgdarśitamapi punarapi darśayati prāpakaṃ jñānamityādinā |
1242:765: yasmātprāpakaṃ vijñānaṃ pramāṇamiṣṭamasmābhiḥ tasmātsā ca prāpaṇaśaktirathaparicchittireva nārthādutpattyādikamiti |
1242:768: yato bījādeḥ sakāśādaṅkurasyārthāvabhāsitvotpattirasti na ca bījādikaṃ prāpayati khalavilāntargatasyāpi bījasyāṅkurotpādakatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
1242:769: tasmādityādinā jñānasyārthādutpattivyāpārādanya eva pramāṇavyāpāra iti darśayati |
1242:771: yadyevaṃ prāpaṇaśaktiḥ phalaṃ tarhi nārthaparicchittinūpaṃ phalam |
1242:773: yadeva prāpakaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva pravartakamarthapradarśakaṃ ca tadeveti purastātsaṃvarṇitaṃ pramāṇasvanūpacintāyām |
1242:774: tataścārthapradarśakameva prāpakaṃ tasya ca prāpaṇaśaktirarthaparicchittireva tāvatā parisamāptatvātpramāṇavyāpārasyeti sthitam |
1242:776: yadi jñānasya pramitinūpaṃ phalaṃ jñānāttarhi pramāṇena bhinnena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ pṛcchati yadi tarhītyādinā |
1242:777: arthasānūpyamasya pramāṇamiti etasya vivaraṇaṃ arthena yatsānūpyamityādi |
1242:780: viṣayādutpadyamānaṃ viṣayasadṛśaṃ bhavatīti tadeva sānūpyaṃ sādṛśyamuktamiti darśayati iha yasmādityādinā nanu cetyādi |
1242:782: indriyādikaṃ pramāṇamuktamasmābhiḥ tadeva kiṃ bauddhenāpi neṣyate yenārthasānūpyaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate |
1242:784: ṅgīkriyamāṇe pramāṇaphalayoraikyānnaikaṃ karma karaṇaṃ bhavatīti yaccoditaṃ tattadavasthameveti |
1242:788: prakṛṣṭopakārakaṃ jñānasya sānūpyameva tadvaśādarthādhigatisiddheḥ nendriyādikaṃ arthasānūpyābhāve'
1242:792: nīlanirbhāsaṃ hītyādinā nīlākāraṃ nīlavijñānasya nīlāvagamavyavasthāyā nimittaṃ darśayati |
1242:793: yasmānnīlākāre vijñānasyāvagate nīlapratītiravagamyate tasmādarthākāraḥ pramāṇaṃ karaṇadharmatvādasyeti |
1242:797: kiṃ tu teṣāṃ sarvajñānotpattiṃ prati nimittatvānna pratiniyatārthavyavasthāpanasya nimittatvam |
1242:800: yattatpareṇa coditaṃ pramāṇaphalayoraikyānna caikaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ vā syāditi tatpariharati |
1242:802: syādayamekasya vastuno virodho yadyayaṃ janyajanakabhāvaḥ pramāṇaphalayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ kiṃ tarhi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvaḥ |
1242:806: tathā hi nīlākāre vijñāna utpanne viśiṣṭajñānaṃ vyavasthāpayanti nīlajñānamanubhūtamiti na jñānamutpādayati |
1242:808: nanu ca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ viśiṣṭākāramutpannaṃ kathaṃ tasya samānakāla evāṃśaṃśitayā vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvo bhavatīti manyamāna pṛcchati |
1242:812: na vijñānameva nirvikalpakamātmānaṃ vyavasthāpayati kiṃtu pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyate |
1242:813: tatra cārthākārasya vyavasthāpanahetutvamasānūpyavyāvṛttibhedenārthabodhatayā vyavasthāpyasyotpādena vedanasya tu vyavasthāpyatvam |
1242:816: nanu nīlajñānamutpannaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣasiddhaṃ yadi niścayavaśātpramāṇavyavasthā labhyate tadā yujyate vaktuṃ niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyata iti yāvatā niścayapratyayaṃ vināpi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyevetyāha niścayapratyayenāvyavasthāpitamityādi darśayati |
1242:817: yāvatpratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ notpādayati na tāvatpramāṇaṃ bhavati ātmavyāpārānirvartanāt |
1242:819: nanu yadi niścayaṃ vinā pramāṇameva na bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vikalpasahitaṃ tarhi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ syānna kevalaṃ tadanvayavyatirekāditi manyamānaścodayati yadyevamityādinā |
1242:821: uṃ niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyata iti yāvatā niścayapratyayaṃ vināpi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyevetyāha niścayapratyayenāvyavasthāpitamityādi darśayati |
1242:822: yāvatpratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ notpādayati na tāvatpramāṇaṃ bhavati ātmavyāpārānirvartanāt |
